register.description: This register controls the CORE power state to reach upon a domain sleep transition

bitfield.description: INTRCONN_WP bank and DMM bank2 state when domain is ON.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is on when the domain is ON.

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 UNICACHE bank state when domain is ON.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is on when the domain is ON.

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 L2 bank state when domain is ON.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is on when the domain is ON.

bitfield.description: OCMRAM bank state when domain is ON.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is on when the domain is ON.

bitfield.description: DMA/ICR bank and DMM bank1 state when domain is ON.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is on when the domain is ON.

bitfield.description: INTRCONN_WP bank and DMM bank2 state when domain is RETENTION.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 UNICACHE bank state when domain is RETENTION.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.
Memory bank is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 L2 bank state when domain is RETENTION.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.
Memory bank is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: OCMRAM bank state when domain is RETENTION.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: DMA/ICR bank and DMM bank1 state when domain is RETENTION.

bitenum.description: Memory bank is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Power state change request when domain has already performed a sleep transition. Allows going into deeper low power state without waking up the power domain.

bitenum.description: Do not request a low power state change.
Request a low power state change. This bit is automatically cleared when the power state is effectively changed or when power state is ON.

bitfield.description: Logic state when power domain is RETENTION

bitenum.description: Only retention registers are retained and remaing logic is off when the domain is in RETENTION state.
Whole logic is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Power state control

register.description: This register provides a status on the current CORE power domain state. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Last low power state entered. Set to 0x3 upon write of the same only. This register is intended for debug purpose only.

bitenum.description: Power domain was previously in RETENTION

bitfield.description: Domain transition status

bitenum.description: No ongoing transition on power domain
Power domain transition is in progress.

bitfield.description: INTRCONN_WP bank and DMM bank2 state status
MPU_A3 UNICACHE bank state status
MPU_A3 L2 bank state status
OCMRAM bank state status
DMA/ICR bank and DMM bank1 state status
Logic state status
Current power state status

register.description: This register contains dedicated L3_1 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated L3_2 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated GPMC context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RET_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated OCMC_RAM context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if memory-based context in CORE_OCMRAM memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source (not affected by a global warm reset).
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register controls the release of the MPU_A3 sub-system resets.

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 MMU and CACHE interface reset control.

bitenum.description: Reset is cleared for MPU_A3 CACHE and MMU
Reset is asserted for the MPU_A3 CACHE and MMU

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 Cortex M3 CPU2 reset control.

bitenum.description: Reset is cleared for the MPU_A3 Cortex M3 CPU2
Reset is asserted for the MPU_A3 Cortex M3 CPU2

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 Cortex M3 CPU1 reset control.

bitenum.description: Reset is cleared for the MPU_A3 Cortex M3 CPU1
Reset is asserted for the MPU_A3 Cortex M3 CPU1

register.description: This register logs the different reset sources of the MPU_A3 SS. Each bit is set upon release of the domain reset signal. Must be cleared by software. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Cortex M3 CPU2 has been reset due to MPU_A3 ICECRUSHER2 reset source

bitenum.description: CPU2 has been reset upon icecrusher reset

bitfield.description: Cortex M3 CPU1 has been reset due to MPU_A3 ICECRUSHER1 reset source

bitenum.description: CPU1 has been reset upon icecrusher reset

bitfield.description: Cortex M3 CPU2 has been reset due to emulation reset source e.g. assert reset command initiated by the icepick module

bitenum.description: CPU2 has been reset upon emulation reset

bitfield.description: Cortex M3 CPU1 has been reset due to emulation reset source e.g. assert reset command initiated by the icepick module

bitenum.description: CPU1 has been reset upon emulation reset

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 MMU and CACHE interface software reset status

bitenum.description: MPU_A3 MMU and CACHE interface has been reset upon software reset

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 Cortex-M3 CPU2 software reset status

bitenum.description: Cortex M3 CPU2 has been reset upon software reset

bitfield.description: MPU_A3 Cortex-M3 CPU1 software reset status

bitenum.description: Cortex M3 CPU1 has been reset upon software reset

register.description: This register contains dedicated MPU_A3 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if memory-based context in MPU_A3_L2RAM memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if memory-based context in MPU_A3_UNICACHE memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of MPU_A3_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of MPU_A3_RST3 signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated SDMA context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if memory-based context in CORE_OTHER_BANK memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of SDMA_RET_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated DMM context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if memory-based context in CORE_NRET_BANK memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if memory-based context in CORE_OTHER_BANK memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated EMIF_FW context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated EMIF_1 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated EMIF_2 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated DLL context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of DLL_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated C2C context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated C2C_FW context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated L4_CFG context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated HW_SEM context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RET_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated MAILBOX context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RET_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated SAR_ROM context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated L3_3 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated L3_INSTR context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated OCP_WP1 context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if memory-based context in CORE_NRET_BANK memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if RFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_PWRON_RET_RST signal)
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. (set upon assertion of CORE_RST signal)
